name: Flodesk for Elementor Pro
author: Studio Cotton

sections.description:
Add Flodesk to the ‘Actions After Submit’ in the Elementor Pro form widget with this easy new plugin from Bristolian web design company Studio Cotton.

No more workarounds and embeds with awkward CSS, with this plugin you’ll be able to use the standard built-in Elementor Forms to collect your email marketing sign-ups, assign segments, and send that data to your Flodesk account.

Want to know more about this plugin? Check out our article on the Studio Cotton blog.

In order to use this plugin you need a Flodesk account. By signing up for an account you agree to Flodesk’s Terms of Service.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the flodesk-for-elementor-pro folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install directly through the plugin installer
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress or by using the link provided by the plugin installer
  3. Generate a Flodesk API key from your Flodesk account
  4. Go your WordPress dashboard and head to Elementor -> Settings -> Integrations
  5. Paste your API key into the Flodesk API key field and click “Save Changes”
  6. Head to the form widget you wish to connect
  7. Add Flodesk to “Actions After Submit”
  8. Go to the new “Flodesk” settings section and check the field IDs match those of your “Form Fields”
  9. Choose your Segments and Double Opt-in settings
  10. Update
  11. Repeat for all Elementor Pro form widgets that you wish to connect
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Updated README to include a link to Flodesk’s Terms of Service.
  • Ensure all strings are translateable.

1.0.0

  • First version.

short_description: Flodesk for Elementor Pro is a Wordpress plugin which allows you to add subscribers to your Flodesk account using the Elementor Pro Form widget.
